attributes.action: Apply pressure to the Bangladeshi Government to release Salah Uddin Shoaib Choudhury, the Bangladeshi newspaper editor facing the death penalty on a charge of 'sedition'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Salah Uddin Shoaib Choudhury, a Bangladeshi newspaper editor is in prison in Bangladesh facing the death penalty. He is on trial for "Sedition, Treason, and Blasphemy." The charges include "praising Jews and Christians," "spying for Israel," and being "an agent of the Mossad".

Please apply pressure to the Bangladeshi Government to:
(i) Release Mr Choudhury
(ii)Cease the persecution of journalists.
